TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdlsInputStream extends System.IO.Stream

Docs.summary: ADLS Input stream that reads data from a file on Data lake. It reads data in bulk from server to a buffer and then provides buffered output to the client as per request. Data can be read asynchronously/synchronously. Data can be read serially or from arbitrary points in file. Read is fully synchronous till the transport layer. ReadAsync is fully asynchronous till the transport layer. AdlsInputStream is not threadsafe since it uses buffer (maintains state so not stateless).
